{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Edgar Wright'], 'Producers': ['Nira Park'], 'Starring': ['Simon Pegg', 'Nick Frost', 'Paddy Considine'], 'Studio': ['NBC Universal']} A deep exploration of human connectedness and brotherly love in the face of cruel time. Add pubs, car chases, explosions, 1000 funny jokes, and you'll have the thread of this film. Pegg and Frost are on par with the great comedy teams of all time. A Riot {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Greg Mottola'], 'Producers': ['Tim Bevan', 'Nira Park', 'Eric Fellner'], 'Starring': ['Simon Pegg', 'Nick Frost', 'Seth Rogen'], 'Studio': ['UNIVERSAL PAY TELEVISION']} I really enjoy these two as a comedy team. The film is very funny and has a lot of social commentary on the US. Great Movie for a laugh {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Lana Wachowski', 'Tom Tykwer', 'Lilly Wachowski'], 'Producers': ['Stefan Arndt', 'Alex Boden', 'David Brown', 'John Chong', 'José Luis Escolar', 'Peter Grossman', 'Grant Hill'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Halle Berry', 'Jim Broadbent'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Gadzooks it made my head hurt trying to rationalize why I was spending time watching it. I loved the Matrix. This was nothing like it. I wanted it to be deep and profound...Nope. Pompous {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Colin Bucksey', 'Neil Burger', 'Adam Bernstein', 'John Dahl', 'Matthew McLoota', 'Anna Boden', 'Ryan Fleck', 'Daniel Attias', 'Karyn Kusama', 'James Foley'], 'Studio': ['Showtime Networks Inc.']} A great cast. A great script. A great production. The writers show a very good understanding of the industry and its culture. Wow John Wick 3 - Parabellum Suspense, Action, Compelling, Thrilling ['Keanu Reeves is back as the legendary hit man John Wick in this sequel that finds him fighting for his life on the streets of NYC.'] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chad Stahelski'], 'Producers': ['Basil Iwanyk', 'Erica Lee'], 'Starring': ['Keanu Reeves', 'Halle Berry', 'Laurence Fishburne']} Non stop action. Very good depiction of expert shooting skill. Thrilling Seven Days in May (1964) John Frankenheimer (Director), Burt Lancaster (Actor), Kirk Douglas (Actor) & 0 more Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Warner Home Video, All Titles ["It happens with startling swiftness and violence. An armed cadre seizes state control. Fortunately, a coup d'etat can't happen here. Or can it? A classic of suspense directed by John Frankenheimer (The Manchurian Candidate, Ronin) and written for the screen by Rod Serling (The Twilight Zone), Seven Days in May tautly explores that possibility. At odds are a popular general and Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman (Burt Lancaster) and an unpopular president (Fredric March) with a pacifist agenda. At stake is the survival of the Republic. A vigilant colonel (Kirk Douglas) uncovers the scheme. But are the seven fateful days ahead enough time to derail a takeover? The clock is ticking."] {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': "Edmond O'Brien, John Frankenheimer, Hugh Marlowe, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Whit Bissell, George Macready, Martin Balsam, Burt Lancaster, Ava GardnerEdmond O'Brien, John Frankenheimer, Hugh Marlowe, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Whit Bissell, George Macready, Martin Balsam, Burt Lancaster, Ava Gardner See more", 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'John Frankenheimer', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 58 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 22, 2016', 'Actors': "Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Fredric March, Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien", 'Studio': 'Warner Archive Collection', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Excellent movie. Explores the balance of power between the military and the civilian authority and the duty that each owes to the country. Powerful acting. Thoughtful script. Place your bets {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Gary Ross'], 'Producers': ['Scott Stuber', 'Gary Ross', 'Jon Kilik'], 'Starring': ['Matthew McConaughey', 'Gugu Mbatha-Raw', 'Mahershala Ali'], 'Studio': ['STXfilms']} Very good script and well acted. Lays out a sweep of history covering slavery to the civil rights era. Very good movie that explains where we are at today. I would highly recco it to young adults. Well done {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Wise'], 'Producers': ['Charles H. Maguire', 'Robert Wise'], 'Starring': ['Steve McQueen', 'Richard Attenborough', 'Richard Crenna'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Very well made film with fantastic script, production, and acting. Very deep messages about the nature of human relationships, love, and war in multiple levels from the space between two people and between two peoples.
I go back to this film every so often to reflect on its meaning. As the West is trying to cope with a China on the rise its message is very relevant today.
The high production value created a flawless view into another time and world. You must see this {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mick Jackson'], 'Producers': ['Scott Ferguson', 'Emily Gerson Saines', 'Gil Bellows', 'Alison Owen', 'Paul Lister', 'Anthony Edwards', 'Dante Di Loreto'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', "Catherine O'Hara", 'Julia Ormond'], 'Studio': ['HBO']} Claire Danes is a fantastic actress. Great story {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Clint Eastwood'], 'Producers': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Albert S. Ruddy', 'Tim Moore', 'Jessica Meier', 'David M. Bernstein'], 'Starring': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Eduardo Minett', 'Natalia Traven']} This movie and The Mule show how refined skill can make a classic film on a low budget. The acting and story in this film are well worth it. Clint Eastwood shows how {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Clint Eastwood'], 'Producers': ['Tim Moore', 'Kristina Rivera', 'Jessica Meier', 'Dan Friedkin', 'Bradley Thomas', 'Aaron Gilbert'], 'Starring': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Bradley Cooper', 'Laurence Fishburne'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Clint Eastwood just keeps getting better.
